cmp: 布 (diffuse/extend/notify, to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known/spread/(cotton) cloth)
mng: to hope, to admire, variant of 稀[xi1]

exm.mng: to wish for, to desire, hope
Edison Chen (1980-), Hong Kong singer and actor
Hill (name), Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs

Hillary (person name), Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician, First lady during Bill Clinton's presidency 1993-2001, Senator for New York since 2001, US Secretary of state from 2009
